name: Escape Route
function: Once per day you may cast the Shackle spell as if you knew it for no mana.

name: Apprentices Reliquary
function: Members of a Sect dedicated to this cornerstone may transfer mana to each other. This requires contact and spending one point of personal mana. This allows the transfer of one mana after five seconds of roleplay. If performed during a Conflux, the reliquary must be present on the Conflux.

name: Barbarians Brutalizer
function: You may call Fracture or Knockback or use Mighty Blow with this weapon.

name: Battlemages Vestment of Control
function: Twice per day you may cast the Silence spell for no mana. You must already know the Silence Spell to do this.

name: Battlemages Vestment of Force
function: Twice per day you may cast the Knockback spell for no mana. You must already know the Knockback spell to do this.

name: Bending Reed Blades
function: You may spend one energy to call Fracture or Shackle with these weapons.

name: Blazesap Striker
function: While bonded to a character with a Naval Investment, if that investment takes the ‘Support the Fleet’ action, it will function as if it were two tiers higher.

name: Bloodslick Banner
function: Members of a band bonded to this banner may empower one character through the sacrifice of hitpoints. Once per day members of this band may grasp the banner and speak their oath. Characters who do this may then reduce their maximum hit points by one for the remainder of the day. One character may then raise their maximum hit points by an amount equal to the sacrificed hitpoints for the remainder of the day. For every three hitpoints gained this way, that character also gains 1 Maximum Energy for the remainder of the day.

name: Broadleaf Spear
function: You may spend one energy to call Knockback with this weapon.

name: Magehunters Call
function: Once per day you may cast the Silence spell as if you knew it for no mana.

name: Conqueror's Halberd
function: You may spend energy to call Shackle or Fracture with this weapon.

name: Dawns Pestle
function: When preparing potions you may spend two Beggars Root as one Rackoric or two Rackoric as one Beggars Root. You may only do this once per preparation.

name: Opportunists Call
function: Once per day you may call Fracture with no energy cost.

name: Enduring Shield
function: You gain two ranks of the Deathless Skill.

name: Elementalists Garb
function: This armour does not inhibit the casting of spells by a mage, as if they had the Battlemage skill.

name: Thunderous Awe
function: Once per day you may cast the Stun spell as if you knew it for no mana.

name: Eves Mortar
function: When preparing potions you may spend two Green Sunleaf as one Stonestem or two Stonestem as one Green Sunleaf. You may only do this once per preparation.

name: Treacheries Kiss
function: Once per day you may cast the Venom spell as if you knew it for no mana.

name: Gray Wizards Robe
function: You gain one additional hitpoint. Requires the Magus skill.

name: Guardian Mage Staff
function: Twice per day you may cast the Stun spell as if you knew it for no mana. You are immune to the Magic Stun effect. Requires the Magus skill

name: Mage Legion Standard
function: All members of the warband bonded to this banner gain one Personal Mana.

name: Windborn
function: Once per day you may cast the Knockback spell as if you knew it for no mana.

name: Manticore Hide Armour
function: You gain one additional hitpoint.

name: Nightmare Hide Armour
function: You gain two ranks of the Deathless skill.

name: Clerics Mace
function: You may cast or swift cast the heal spell as if you knew it.

name: Phial of the Sun
function: Once per day when using the Surgeon skill you may decant some liquid from this phial and use it as if it were one herb of your choice. This may not be used for the crafting of potions.

name: Prime Hunters Bow
function: You gain one level of Divine Lore: Arcadian

name: Strikers Hand
function: You may cast the knockback spell as if you knew it.

name: Rootwarder
function: Twice per day you may cast the Shackle spell as if you knew it for no mana. You are immune to the Magic Shackle effect. Requires the Magus skill.

name: Scorpions Barb
function: Twice per day you may cast the Venom spell as if you knew it for no mana. You are immune to the Magic Venom effect. Requires the Magus skill

name: Scouts Bow
function: You gain two ranks of Deathless

name: Skirmishers Aketon
function: You gain one additional hitpoint.

name: Slayers Banner
function: A warband that fights under this banner will draw additional attention from Elite and Monstrous enemy units so long as they are acting aggressively.

name: Survivors Platemail
function: You may ignore the roleplay effects of a single traumatic wound until the end of the battle.

name: Tail of the Beast
function: You may spend one energy to make the Shackle or Venom call with this weapon.

name: Tacticians Demand
function: You may cast the empower spell as if you knew it.

name: Arch Priests Blade
function: As long as you know any of the Heal, Purify or Mend Limb spells, Twice per day you may cast the Heal, Purify and Mend Limb spells simultaneously for a cost of one mana or two mana if swift cast.

name: Wayfarers Pyx
function: Once per day, when the sect that is bonded to this reliquary is performing a ceremony, its magnitude is reduced by two.

name: Blade of Peace
function: You may cast the Heal, Mend Limb and Purify spells as if you knew them.

name: Blade of War
function: You may cast the Knockback, Stun, Damage and Venom spells as if you knew them.

name: Artisans Oil
function:
A character with the Artisan skill can roleplay applying the oil to a shield or weapon affected by the Break call. After which the Artisans oil is consumed but the item is returned to normal function.
The roleplay is interrupted if you or the item are struck or if you engage in combat or move faster than a walking pace. The oil is not consumed in this circumstance but the roleplay must begin again.
Artisan's oil is unique in requiring quite mundane ingredients. It requires 8 Keys worth of goods to make and is made in batches of 3. Artisan's oil still requires time to craft, as such is crafted like any other Artisans craft. All Artisans can make Artisans Oil.

name: Battleplate
function: You gain one additional hitpoint.

name: Bonebreaker
function: You may spend one energy to call Fracture or use the Mighty Blow effect with this weapon.

name: Boulders Staff
function: You may cast the stun spell as if you knew it.

name: Brandts Blade
function: You may spend one energy to call Silence with this weapon on a strike that would deal damage. When you use this effect you are also affected by Silence.

name: Crystalhunger Robes
function: Once per day, when you consume a piece of crystal mana, it restores three personal mana rather than one.

name: Druids Crook
function: You may cast the shackle spell as if you knew it.

name: Greatweapon of the Old Ways
function: This weapon may not be used to deliver the Knockback effect. Instead, while wielding the weapon in two hands you may strike a shield and call ‘Magic Damage 3’. Expend one energy. As this strike can only affect a shield, please inform the target if you miss.

name: Guards Watcher
function: You may spend one energy to call Knockback or Shackle with this weapon.

name: Linebreakers Staff
function: You may cast the knockback spell as if you knew it.

name: Marauders Warcoat
function: While wearing this armour you may spend one energy to call Fracture with Polearms, Greatweapons or One Handed Weapons.

name: Medics Gambeson
function: You may offer first aid to characters who are bleeding out. While doing so the characters bleedout time is paused. This requires two hands, your full attention, appropriate roleplay and being stationary.

name: Mountebanks Surprise
function: Once per day when you cast the Empower spell on a target you are also affected by the empower spell.
type: Weapon: Pair: Short Weapon and One Handed Weapon

name: Reforging Gavel
function: You may cast or swift cast the reforging spell as if you knew it.

name: Saga of the Lost
function: A member of this sect will never become a conscious undead. If their spirit is called upon after their death they will be calm and aware of their circumstances. Members of this sect may roleplay stoic silence rather than pain while in the terminal state.

name: Serpent's Tail
function: You may cast the venom spell as if you knew it.

name: Warriors Right Hand
function: Gain one additional energy.

name: Standard of the Brave
function: Once per Conflux you may call immune to a fear effect or remove the Fear effect from a member of your Warband.

name: Apprentices Penknife
function: You gain one additional personal mana.

name: Comrades Knife
function: Whenever you cast or swift cast the heal spell you gain one hit point.

name: Desperate Times
function: Once per day you may call Venom with this weapon for no energy or mana cost. You are also affected by Venom when you use this ability.

name: Flameborn Dagger
function: You may cast the Damage spell as if you knew it.

name: Warmages Blessing
function: You gain one additional hitpoint. This item requires the Battlemage skill.

name: Arcane Shears
function: Twice per day you may use this item to cut a bond connecting a magical item to an individual. You may only use this item if you have the Artisan skill.

name: Purifying Scalpel
function: When you cast (but not swift cast) the Heal spell you may also remove the Venom effect from the target.

name: Archmage's Staff
function: Twice per day you may cast, or where appropriate swift cast any spell you know for no mana cost.

name: Armsman's Amulet
function: You gain the Weaponmaster skill

name: Artebazzani Artifact
function: Once per day your sect may join with another sect to perform a ceremony together. While your sects may perform the ceremony together they are still treated as separate sects for all other purposes. Your Sect does not gain the benefit of the Sects reliquaries if any.

name: Avalanche
function: You may spend one energy to call either Break or use the Mighty Blow effect with this weapon.

name: Barons Blessed Cairn
function: When your sect performs a ceremony that targets resources in a single region, the ceremony may also affect resources in a second region of the same Realm.

name: Battlehealers Coat
function: When you cast or swift cast the Heal, Purify or Mend Limb spells you regain one hitpoint.

name: Beggars Key
function: Twice per day after thirty seconds of roleplay you may open a portal as you had used the Channel Waystone spell. You may use this power if you are wearing armour.

name: Acolyte's Assistant
function: You may cast or swift cast the heal spell as if you knew it.

name: Setting Blade
function: You may cast or swift cast the mend limb spell as if you knew it.

name: Bloodcloak
function: Three times per day when you use the Surgeon skill you can roleplay drawing some of your own blood and using it in place of a herb of your choice.

name: Bracelet of the Young Ward
function: You gain the Bulwark skill

name: Bramblehafted Spear
function: Twice per day you may call Shackle for no cost. This strike can hit any of the standard thrusting locations.

name: Thieves Good Hand
function: You may cast the silence spell as if you knew it.

name: Celebrants Chain
function: You may cast the Create Bond spell without spending mana.

name: Dragonhide Plate
function: You gain two additional hitpoints.

name: Duelists Obstinate Ally
function: When you spend one energy you regain one hitpoint.

name: Forgemasters Shield
function: You may spend one energy to remove the Break effect from this Shield. This requires five seconds of uninterrupted roleplay. Performing this action causes you to be affected by ‘Shield 1’

name: Forgesteel Armour
function: You may spend one energy to ignore a Fracture call.

name: Guardians Banner
function: While at least five members of a Warband that fights under this banner remain around the far side of a portal during a Skirmish or Major conflux, the portal will remain open for an additional ten minutes.

name: Harness of Heartiness
function: After five seconds of roleplaying that includes a loud invocation of cleansing you may spend one energy to remove the Venom condition from yourself. Performing this action causes you to be affected by ‘Shield 1’

name: Hoplites Spear
function: Gain one additional energy.

name: Hunters Ark
function: Members of this sect who are performing an Arcadian ceremony may use Beastbone instead of Crystal Mana. Every two measures of Beastbone count as one Crystal Mana.

name: Illuminating Forge
function: Members of this sect who are performing a Lumos ceremony may use Sun’s Iron instead of crystal mana. Every two measures of Sun’s Iron counts as one Crystal Mana.

name: Immortals Shield
function: You gain one additional hitpoint and two ranks of the Deathless skill.

name: Legionnaires Commandment
function: When your Sect completes a ceremony that targets characters who are all members of a single band, the ceremony may also target members of a different band that are from the same Realm.

name: Lich Paragon’s Robe
function: You gain three ranks of the Deathless skill.

name: Matched Thunderbolts
function: If you strike a shield or individual with both weapons at once, you may spend one energy and call knockback.

name: Mercenary Banner
function: Members of this Warband may fight with a different Realm during the Major Conflux they attend. Which realm the intend to to join must be announced at the War Chamber meeting prior to that Major Conflux.

name: Mundane Forcebarrier
function: You gain two additional personal mana and one additional hitpoint.

name: Opened Eye
function: Twice per day you may cast the Fear spell for no mana. You must know the Fear spell to use this effect.

name: Philosophers Charm
function: Once per day, a character bonded to this item may transmute X amount of minerals into any one other mineral. In this circumstance X equals the amount of mana being expended. This requires thirty seconds of roleplay and the presence of a Civil Servant.

name: Pugilists Charm
function: You may spend one energy to restore a limb affected by the Fracture call. This requires five seconds of roleplay that is interrupted upon receiving a strike to you or your target.

name: Pyromancers Staff
function: Twice per day you may cast the Damage spell for no mana. You may spend one Mana to ignore a Magic Damage effect. You must know the Damage spell to use these effects.

name: Rag of Warfare
function: While wielding this banner you gain five additional hit points.

name: Robe of the Saviour
function: Twice per day when you cast or swift cast the Heal spell you may do so without spending mana.

name: Robes of the Seer
function: You gain two additional personal mana

name: Runeplate
function: You gain two additional hitpoints.

name: Sargents Fist
function: You gain two additional energy.

name: Torment’s Blade
function: You may cast the fear spell as if you knew it.

name: Shattering Stone
function: Members of this sect who are performing an Anarch ceremony may use Bloodglass instead of crystal mana. Every two measures of Bloodglass counts as one Crystal Mana.

name: Slayers Blade
function: Gain one additional energy.

name: Smiths Polearm
function: You may spend one energy to remove the Break effect from this weapon. This requires five seconds of uninterrupted roleplay. Performing this action causes you to be affected by ‘Shield 1’

name: Soldiers Hauberk
function: Gain one additional energy.

name: Squires Mail
function: Gain one additional energy.

name: Standard of the Tower
function: While wielding this standard you gain three additional personal mana, and all members of the Warband bonded to this banner gain one additional personal mana.

name: Starlit Pool
function: Members of this sect who are performing a Stallia ceremony may use Black Sap instead of crystal mana. Every two measures of Black Sap counts as one Crystal Mana.

name: Steel Pillar
function: Members of this sect who are performing a Cervitas ceremony may use Forgesteel instead of crystal mana. Every two measures of Forgesteel counts as one crystal mana.

name: Warfletcher
function: You gain two additional hitpoints.

name: Warlocks Longknives
function: You may either expend one energy to regain one personal mana or expend three personal mana to regain one energy.

name: Seers Knife
function: You gain two additional personal mana.

name: Weighted Scales
function: Members of this sect who are performing a Panoply ceremony may use Shimmering Scales instead of crystal mana. Every two measures of Shimmering Scales counts as one Crystal Mana.

name: Wolverines Bite
function: Twice per day when you use Fracture you may strike two targets instead of one for no additional cost. You have only 10 seconds to deliver the second Fracture.
